Name: College of Arts and Sciences
Description: Here in Drexel's CoAS, we are committed to implementing in-the-moment change, not for personal glory, but because it's what the world needs.
Address: 3250 Chestnut Street MacAlister Hall, Suite 4020 Philadelphia, PA 19104

Name: LeBow College of Business
Description: At Drexel LeBow, our rigorous and experience-based business education is custom built for the driven and determined.

Name: College of Computer & Informatics
Description: The College of Computing & Informatics is a national leader in information and technology education.

Name: College of Engineering
Description: Since its beginning, engineering has been the cornerstone of Drexel, and our students, faculty and alumni produce robust research, integrate emerging engineering practices and innovate for positive change in our world.

Name: College of Medicine
Description: The Graduate School's academic programs emphasize real-world experience.

Name: College of Nursing and Health Professions
Description: Going beyond the standard, our curricula emphasize the emerging field of interprofessional care.

Name: Goodwin College of Professional Studies
Description: Drexel's Goodwin College of Professional Studies can find the program that's right for you, around your goals and schedule.

Name: Antoinette Westphal College of Media Arts & Design
Description: At Drexel's Westphal College of Media Arts & Design we go about teaching design, media, and the performing arts in a different way.
Address: URBN Center, 3501 Market St, Philadelphia, PA 19104

Name: Pennoni Honors College
Description: The Pennoni Honors College is a community for all Drexel Dragons, where they are invited to become explorers of the unknown and plot one's own path through conversation, debate, discovery, intellectual curiosity, self-reflection, and more.
Address: 3250 Chestnut Street, 5016 MacAlister Hall, Philadelphia, PA 19104
